name: UFO Fighters
description:
Claw machine stravaganza! Have you ever being frustrated by a Claw Machine? This is your chance to play and have fun with it now. 2 players versus, get your claw and star grabbing!

Create by Bruno Briseno, Saulo Camarotti and Thiago Marten. All members of Behold Studios, creators of Knights of Pen & Paper and Chroma Squad.

Game created in a game jam called FliperJAM. An Arcade was built from scratch while 17 games were made for the arcade.
